text: Hope Valley is a census-designated place (CDP) and village in Hopkinton in western Rhode Island. The 2020 United States Census showed 1,612 people living in Hope Valley. The central section of Hope Valley was listed on the United States' National Register of Historic Places in late 2004 as Hope Valley Historic District. This 183-acre historic district has 137 contributing properties. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Rhode Island Category:Villages in Rhode Island
title: Hope Valley, Rhode Island
